abuse-confidence-score.description: Rating (0-100) of how confident AbuseIPDB is that an IP address is entirely malicious

is-malicious.description: If the IP is malicious based on the abuse-confidence-score and threshold

is-tor.description: If Tor (The Onion Router) was used

is-whitelisted.description: If an IP is spotted in any of AbuseIPDB's whitelists

description: AbuseIPDB checks an ip address, domain name, or subnet against a central blacklist
name: abuseipdb
